00020   class LCHcalCalibrationObject : public LCGenericObject {
00021 
00022   public:
00023     
00026     LCHcalCalibrationObject():_createdObject( true )  {
00027       //create a simple generic object
00028       _obj = new LCGenericObjectImpl() ;
00029     }
00030     
00031 
00032     LCHcalCalibrationObject(LCObject* obj) : 
00033       _createdObject(false)  {
00034       
00035       _obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObjectImpl*>( obj )  ;
00036       
00037 
00038        
00039 
00040       //a sanity check ...
00041 
00042       if( _obj==0 ){
00043 
00044         // could be an instance of LCGenericObjectImplExt !?
00045         LCHcalCalibrationObject* f = 
00046           dynamic_cast< LCHcalCalibrationObject* >( obj ) ;
00047 
00048         if( f != 0 )
00049           _obj = f->obj() ;
00050 
00051       }
00052 
00053       //Throw an exception if sthg. goes wrong
00054       if( _obj==0 ){
00055         throw Exception("Cannot create LCHcalCalibrationObject from sth."
00056                         " that is not LCGenericObjectImpl" ) ;
00057       } 
00058       
00059     }
00060     
00061 
00064     LCGenericObjectImpl* obj() { return _obj ; }
00065     
00066     
00069     virtual ~LCHcalCalibrationObject() { 
00070       if( _createdObject )  delete _obj ; 
00071     }
00072     
00073     
00075     virtual int id() { return _obj->id() ; }
00076     
00077     
00078     // ---- need to implement LCGenericObject interface:
00079     
00080     int getNInt() const    { return _obj->getNInt() ; } 
00081     int getNFloat() const  { return _obj->getNFloat() ; }  
00082     int getNDouble() const { return _obj->getNDouble() ; } 
00083     
00084     int getIntVal(int index) const {
00085       return _obj->getIntVal( index ) ;
00086     }
00087     float getFloatVal(int index) const { 
00088       return _obj->getFloatVal( index ) ;
00089     }
00090     double getDoubleVal(int index) const {
00091       return  _obj->getDoubleVal( index ) ;
00092     }
00093     bool isFixedSize() const { return false ; }
00094     
00095     float getConstant(){return getFloatVal(0);}
00096     float getConstantError(){return getFloatVal(1);}
00097     void setConstant( float c ){_obj->setFloatVal(0, c );}
00098     void setConstantError( float ce ){_obj->setFloatVal(1, ce );}
00099 
00100 
00101     // ---- end of LCGenericObject interface
00102 
00105     unsigned getCellKey() const {
00106       return (unsigned) (_obj->getIntVal(0));
00107     };  
00108     
00111     void setCellKey(unsigned cellKey) {
00112       _obj->setIntVal(0, (int) cellKey);   
00113     }; 
00114 
00117     unsigned getChip() const {
00118       return (unsigned) ((getCellKey() & 0xFF00)>>8);
00119     };
00120   
00123     unsigned getChannel() const {
00124       return (unsigned) (getCellKey() & 0x00FF);
00125     };
00126

00170       return true;
